name: 深渊矿脉
description:
This is an open world sandbox game.

Currently, it is the first large version to be released.

The content of the game includes:

1. Mining and synthesis of mysterious keys.

2. Domestication of mechanical mount

3. The gene synthesis of mechanical mount is used to create unique mount.

4. Dig in the abyss, get parts, get new mecha.

5. Build your own house and store your treasures.

6. Stealing other people's houses.

7. In the city, stalls sell things they don't need, and become a safe area for urban residents to enjoy.

8. Become a city and enjoy urban tax.

9. After buying the game, you can enjoy a certain proportion of the dividend of the game income.

10. To explore underground relics, it is necessary to support two person exploration and four person exploration. First of all, the entrances that can appear in many places on the map will be needed. The relics will produce props to upgrade the mount.

11. There are turret points in the game. You need to spend a high price to get permission. Building houses around the turret helps to prevent theft.

12. The boss in the game will drop some rare items, and the boss will occasionally show his weakness. Use the third type of body to attack the boss.

13. As an independent game producer, the game will continue to improve, tentatively updated for a monthly version, will continue to online new body, new mount, new underground palace, linkage mecha, new city, etc.
